moves.name: Scratch
moves.description: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

moves.name: Focus Energy
moves.description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Ember
moves.description: The target is attacked with small flames. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Peck
moves.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

moves.name: Sand Attack
moves.description: Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing its accuracy.

moves.name: Fire Spin
moves.description: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

moves.name: Slash
moves.description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Mirror Move
moves.description: The user counters the target by mimicking the target's last move.

moves.name: Flamethrower
moves.description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.
